long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus partner allows users to list down all website url links that they wish to block and whenever focus timer is on it restricts user to access the listed websites 
How ?
1.User logs in from his Google chrome account (we enable auto-pull of the email identity ,so as to make on boarding seamless)
2.Choose your favourite avatar 
3.Create a focus session anytime you want to work on a task 
4.once created user access to the websites he has listed will be blocked ,by a UI pop-message screen encouraging users to stick to their tasks
5.In case the user wants to remove the block ,he can turn off the focus timer anytime 
6.Please check our privacy policy : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OF7b8Ph-SCciNsyrleRfVmL6mr18ELXS/view?usp=sharing
